title: 2011 Toyota 8FGCU20 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Hydraulic Fork Positioner
item_description:
2011 Toyota 8FGCU20 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Hydraulic Fork Positioner

  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 8FGCU20
  • Load Capacity: 4000 LB
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Two Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 7379
  • Truck Weight: 7370 Lb
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 21x7x15
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 16x6x10-1/2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 80”
  • Engine: Toyota 4Y ECS
  • Propane tank not included. 
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Operational: Yes, see video
  • Function test: Pass, see video
    • Driving forward and backward
    • Turning right and left
    • Tilting up and down
    • Shifting right and left
    • Mast traveling up and down.
  • Features:
    • Side Shift
    • Tilt
